name: PDFExportPreference
shortdesc: PDF export settings for the application object.

property.name: effectivePDFDestinationProfile
property.shortdesc: Effective destination color profile. Can return: PDFProfileSelector enumerator or String.

property.name: effectiveOCRegistry
property.shortdesc: Effective PDF/X OC Registry.

property.name: effectiveOutputCondition
property.shortdesc: Effective PDF/X output condition.

property.name: effectivePDFXProfile
property.shortdesc: Effective PDF X color profile. Can return: PDFProfileSelector enumerator or String.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the PDFExportPreference (a Application).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: pageRange
property.shortdesc: The pages to print, specified either as an enumeration or a string. To specify a range, separate page numbers in the string with a hyphen (-). To specify separate pages, separate page numbers in the string with a comma (,). Can return: PageRange enumerator or String.

property.name: useSecurity
property.shortdesc: If true, activates security controls for the PDF document.

property.name: openDocumentPassword
property.shortdesc: The password to enter when opening the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true. Note: A script can set but not get this value.

property.name: changeSecurityPassword
property.shortdesc: Changes the open document password to the specified string. Valid only when use security is true. Note: A script can set but not get this value.

property.name: disallowPrinting
property.shortdesc: If true, users cannot print the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

property.name: disallowChanging
property.shortdesc: If true, users cannot fill in forms, sign, extract pages, or add comments in the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

property.name: disallowCopying
property.shortdesc: If true, users cannot copy and paste text, images, or other content from the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

property.name: disallowNotes
property.shortdesc: If true, users cannot add or change notes, edit text, or fill in form fields in the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

property.name: disallowFormFillIn
property.shortdesc: If true, users cannot change form fields in the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

property.name: disallowExtractionForAccessibility
property.shortdesc: If true, users cannot extract content from the PDF document using software tools for the visually impaired. Valid only when use security is true.

property.name: disallowDocumentAssembly
property.shortdesc: If true, users cannot insert, delete, or rotate pages in the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

property.name: disallowHiResPrinting
property.shortdesc: If true, users cannot print high-resolution copies of the PDF document. Valid only when use security is true.

property.name: disallowPlaintextMetadata
property.shortdesc: If true and acrobat compatibility is Acrobat 6 or higher, storage systems and search engines cannot access metadata stored in the PDF document. If true and acrobat compatibility is acrobat 5 or higher, users cannot copy and extract content from the document. Valid only when use security is true.

property.name: viewPDF
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically opens the PDF file after exporting.

property.name: subsetFontsBelow
property.shortdesc: Sets the threshold for embedding complete fonts based on how many of the fonts' characters are used in the document. If the percentage of characters used in the document for any given font exceeds the specified value, the font is completely embedded; otherwise, the font is subsetted. (Range: 0 to 100) Notes: Embedding complete fonts increases file size. To completely embed all fonts, use 0 (zero).

property.name: pdfColorSpace
property.shortdesc: The color space to use to represent color information in the exported PDF document.

property.name: includeICCProfiles
property.shortdesc: The ICC Profiles to include in the exported PDF document. Can also accept: Boolean.

property.name: omitEPS
property.shortdesc: If true, replaces EPS images with OPI links.

property.name: omitPDF
property.shortdesc: If true, replaces PDF images with OPI links.

property.name: omitBitmaps
property.shortdesc: If true, replaces bitmap images with OPI links.

property.name: cropImagesToFrames
property.shortdesc: If true, image data that falls outside the visible portion of an image's frame is not exported to the PDF document.

property.name: generateThumbnails
property.shortdesc: If true, generates thumbnail images for each page or spread.

property.name: optimizePDF
property.shortdesc: If true, optimizes the exported PDF document for faster viewing in a web browser. Note: Compresses text and line art, regardless of specified compression settings.

property.name: includeStructure
property.shortdesc: If true, creates a tagged PDF file. Note: If acrobat compatibility is acrobat 6 or higher, tags are visible only when the PDF is opened in Acrobat 6 or higher.

property.name: acrobatCompatibility
property.shortdesc: The exported PDF document's Acrobat compatibility.

property.name: simulateOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, simulates the effects of overprinting spot inks with different neutral density values by converting spot colors to process colors for printing. Note: Not valid when the color output mode is defined to leave color profiles unchanged.

property.name: pdfDestinationProfile
property.shortdesc: The gamut of the final RGB or CMYK device. Can return: PDFProfileSelector enumerator or String.

property.name: pdfXProfile
property.shortdesc: The PDF X color profile to use for the PDF document. . Can return: PDFProfileSelector enumerator or String.

property.name: includeHyperlinks
property.shortdesc: If true, includes hyperlinks when exporting the document.

property.name: includeBookmarks
property.shortdesc: If true, displays bookmarks and table of contents entries as links in the bookmarks pane in the PDF document. If false, no bookmarks are exported.

property.name: exportNonprintingObjects
property.shortdesc: If true, makes non-printing objects visible in the PDF document.

property.name: exportGuidesAndGrids
property.shortdesc: If true, includes visible guides and baseline grids in the PDF document.

property.name: exportLayers
property.shortdesc: If true, saves each layer as an Acrobat layer within the PDF document.

property.name: standardsCompliance
property.shortdesc: The PDF/X standards compliance to test against.

property.name: outputCondition
property.shortdesc: The name of the intended printing condition. Valid only when a PDF/X compliance standard has been defined for the document. Not valid when PDF/X-3 is the compliance standard or PDF export preset. For information on compliance standards, see standards compliance and PDF X standards.

property.name: colorBitmapSampling
property.shortdesc: The sampling option to apply to color bitmap images in the PDF document.

property.name: colorBitmapSamplingDPI
property.shortdesc: The ppi of the resampled image. (Range: 9 to 2400)

property.name: colorBitmapCompression
property.shortdesc: The amount of bitmap compression to use.

property.name: colorBitmapQuality
property.shortdesc: The compression option to apply to color images.

property.name: grayscaleBitmapSampling
property.shortdesc: The sampling option to apply to grayscale bitmap images.

property.name: grayscaleBitmapSamplingDPI
property.shortdesc: The ppi of the resampled image. (Range: 9 to 2400)

property.name: grayscaleBitmapCompression
property.shortdesc: The bitmap compression option to apply to grayscale bitmap images.

property.name: grayscaleBitmapQuality
property.shortdesc: The compression option to apply to grayscale bitmap images.

property.name: monochromeBitmapSampling
property.shortdesc: The sampling option to apply to monochrome bitmap images.

property.name: monochromeBitmapSamplingDPI
property.shortdesc: The ppi of the resampled image. (Range: 9 to 2400)

property.name: monochromeBitmapCompression
property.shortdesc: The bitmap compression option to apply to monochrome bitmap images.

property.name: compressTextAndLineArt
property.shortdesc: If true, compresses text and line art using ZIP compression.

property.name: thresholdToCompressColor
property.shortdesc: The minimum dpi at which color compression is applied. (Range: 1 to 10 times the value specified for color bitmap sampling DPI.)

property.name: thresholdToCompressGray
property.shortdesc: The minimum dpi at which grayscale compression is applied. (Range: 1 to 10 times the value specified for grayscale bitmap sampling DPI.)

property.name: thresholdToCompressMonochrome
property.shortdesc: The minimum dpi at which monochrome compression is applied. (Range: 1 to 10 times the value specified for monochrome bitmap sampling DPI.)

property.name: colorTileSize
property.shortdesc: The tile size for color images. Valid only when color bitmap compression is JPEG 2000. (Range: 128 to 2048)

property.name: grayTileSize
property.shortdesc: The tile size for grayscale images. Valid only when grayscale bitmap compression is JPEG 2000. (Range: 128 to 2048)

property.name: compressionType
property.shortdesc: The objects to compress in the PDF document.

property.name: exportReaderSpreads
property.shortdesc: If true, each spread in the exported document is combined into a single page that has spread's original width.

property.name: pageMarksOffset
property.shortdesc: The offset from the edge of the page for page marks.

property.name: cropMarks
property.shortdesc: Prints crop marks that define where the page should be trimmed.

property.name: pageInformationMarks
property.shortdesc: If true, prints the filename, page number, current date and time, and color separation name.

property.name: bleedMarks
property.shortdesc: If true, print bleed marks.

property.name: colorBars
property.shortdesc: If true, add small squares of color representing the CMYK inks and tints of gray in 10% increments.

property.name: registrationMarks
property.shortdesc: If true, prints small targets outside the page area for aligning color separations.

property.name: printerMarkWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight for printer's marks.

property.name: bleedTop
property.shortdesc: The height of the bleed area at the top of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

property.name: bleedInside
property.shortdesc: The width of the bleed area at the inside of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

property.name: bleedBottom
property.shortdesc: The height of the bleed area at the bottom of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

property.name: bleedOutside
property.shortdesc: The width of the bleed area at the outside of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

property.name: pdfMarkType
property.shortdesc: The type of printer marks, either an enum value or the name of a custom marks file. Can return: MarkTypes enumerator or String.

property.name: useDocumentBleedWithPDF
property.shortdesc: If true, uses the document's bleed settings in the PDF document.

property.name: includeSlugWithPDF
property.shortdesc: If true, includes the document's slug area in the PDF document.

property.name: ignoreSpreadOverrides
property.shortdesc: If true, ignores flattener spread overrides.

property.name: appliedFlattenerPreset
property.shortdesc: The transparency flattener preset to use.

property.name: outputConditionName
property.shortdesc: The name of the output condition. Valid only when a PDF/X standard has been defined for the document.

property.name: ocRegistry
property.shortdesc: The web address for the output condition registry. Not valid when PDF/X-3 is the compliance standard or PDF export preset.

property.name: interactiveElementsOption
property.shortdesc: How to draw interactive elements.

property.name: exportWhichLayers
property.shortdesc: Which layers to export.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PDFExportPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
